item.title: Favorite Mac Applications
item.description: Productivity Alfred 4: Quick start and workflow. Office: Microsoft Office. Dropbox | 坚果云: Auto sync tool. Xmind X & Xmind 8: I usually edit in Xmind 8, then review in Xmind X. Notion: Powerful note. Utilities Jitouch: Trackpad enhance. Rectangle: Windows manage. Mos | Scroll Reverser: Mouse and Trackpad reversal. Keka: Compress and decompress. IINA: Best video player. CopyLess 2: Clipboard history. AppCleaner: Application uninstall tool. Xnip:
item.dc:creator: dotleo
